Package bytemusketeers.heslingtonhustle.ui

Provides factories and controllers for on-screen user interface elements
Author:
ENG1 Team 23 (Cohort 3)
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameOverMenu
    The GameOverMenu should display once the final day has been reached
    HeadsUpDisplay
    The HeadsUpDisplay displays persistent player and game information throughout the gameplay.
    Overlay
    An Overlay denotes a distinctly Drawable scene, typically rendered on top of a Screen
    OverlayFactory
    The OverlayFactory constructs types of Overlay objects given with a persistent SpriteBatch
    PauseMenu
    The PauseMenu provides a pleasant Overlay to display upon a pause being requested, or a game Screen losing focus.
